column4: is somebody else having problem with flash on firefox and ubuntu 9.04 64bit?
is somebody else having problem with flash on firefox and ubuntu 9.04 64bit?

i've used flash on linux for years on server different distros on both 32 & 64 bit archs - it has always been a "bit" buggy, even now under 64 9.04 i have occasional problem with flash and need to close all firefox windows before it will work again - but Most of the time it work, and i can live with the "bugs"
same problem here, I hate closing firefox completely every once in a while
